page.title: 14Mr.Jackson's Farm.
page.content: Mr.Jackson employs one full time helper with additional temporary help to bale hay used as Winter feed for the cattle. The lambing season in February and March is the busiest time of the year. He has about 100 sheep and 80 beef cattle. Mr.Jackson visits markets at Abergavenny, Nelson and Newport to buy and sell his produce. He gets up at 7 a.m. every day. Machinery found on the farm includes:- tractors, rollers, bulldozer, mowers, manure spreaders, livestock box and harrows. Mr.Jackson thinks that to be a farmer you have to be interested in and fond of animals. You also need financial backing to begin with.
